price: 23. Mpe tokozua maye basalaki mpe tokomisi yango putulu ezali kopumbwa.
arabic: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqadim'nā ilā mā ʿamilū min ʿamalin fajaʿalnāhu habāan manthūran
